name: PlayCat
description: layCat is a cross-chain native IP built on SONY Chain (Soneium) + Chainlink CCIP, celebrating Japanese creativity through community-driven storytelling. As an open IP mascot with modular culture layers, it pioneers protocol-native narrative evolution. All tokens are fair-launched via Four.meme's bonding curve, with zero pre-sales or team allocations. Multi-chain governance empowers creators to co-build the "Playverse" metaverse.
